tipContents.cn: 小心它喷出的毒液，陷入其中会持续受到伤害。
tipContents.en: Avoid the poisonous spit. Stepping on it will deal continuous DMG to the operator.

tipContents.cn: 小心它喷出的毒液，陷入其中会持续受到伤害。
tipContents.en: Avoid the poisonous spit. Stepping on it will deal continuous DMG to the operator.

tipContents.en: Avoid the poisonous spit. Stepping on it will deal continuous DMG to the operator.

tipContents.en: Avoid the poisonous spit. Stepping on it will deal continuous DMG to the operator.

tipContents.cn: 若有干员被他抓住，可尽快用其他干员使用技能打断来解救。
tipContents.en: If an operator is grabbed, use another operator's skill to interrupt the enemy and free the grabbed operator.

tipContents.cn: 若有干员被他抓住，可尽快用其他干员使用技能打断来解救。
tipContents.en: If an operator is grabbed, use another operator's skill to interrupt the enemy and free the grabbed operator.

tipContents.en: If an operator is grabbed, use another operator's skill to interrupt the enemy and free the grabbed operator.

tipContents.en: If an operator is grabbed, use another operator's skill to interrupt the enemy and free the grabbed operator.

tipContents.cn: 他的蓄力攻击可以被干员的技能打断。
tipContents.en: The enemy's charged attack can be interrupted by operator skills.

tipContents.cn: 若有干员被他抓住，可尽快用其他干员使用技能打断来解救。
tipContents.en: If an operator is grabbed, use another operator's skill to interrupt the enemy and free the grabbed operator.

tipContents.cn: 不要在同一个位置停留，保持移动，否则可能会被脚下突然钻出的源石柱攻击到。
tipContents.en: Keep moving. If you stay at one place too long, Originium pillars will erupt from the ground and strike you.

tipContents.cn: 不要在同一个位置停留，保持移动，否则可能会被脚下突然钻出的源石柱攻击到。
tipContents.en: Keep moving. If you stay at one place too long, Originium pillars will erupt from the ground and strike you.

tipContents.cn: 不要在同一个位置停留，保持移动，否则可能会被脚下突然钻出的源石柱攻击到。
tipContents.en: Keep moving. If you stay at one place too long, Originium pillars will erupt from the ground and strike you.

tipContents.cn: 不要在同一个位置停留，保持移动，否则可能会被脚下突然钻出的源石柱攻击到。
tipContents.en: Keep moving. If you stay at one place too long, Originium pillars will erupt from the ground and strike you.

tipContents.cn: 不要在同一个位置停留，保持移动，否则可能会被脚下突然钻出的源石柱攻击到。
tipContents.en: Keep moving. If you stay at one place too long, Originium pillars will erupt from the ground and strike you.

tipContents.cn: 不要在同一个位置停留，保持移动，否则可能会被脚下突然钻出的源石柱攻击到。
tipContents.en: Keep moving. If you stay at one place too long, Originium pillars will erupt from the ground and strike you.

tipContents.cn: 它的攻击伤害非常高，可以寻找掩护进行躲避。
tipContents.en: The enemy has high damage attacks. Seek cover and evade.

tipContents.cn: 它的攻击伤害非常高，可以寻找掩护进行躲避。
tipContents.en: The enemy has high damage attacks. Seek cover and evade.

tipContents.cn: 强攻形态：如果能及时打断它的技能蓄力，可以对其累积高额失衡值。
tipContents.en: ASSAULT FORM: Interrupt the charging of the Triaggelos's skill to apply high Stagger to it.

tipContents.cn: 搜查形态：要注意靠近源石树枝，躲避大型锚点波。从地面袭来的小型锚点波可以用跳跃躲避。
tipContents.en: SEARCH FORM: Get close to the Originium branches for protection against the large Ankhor shockwaves. Smaller shockwaves can be evaded by jumping over them.

tipContents.cn: 诡计形态：打破其隐形的话，可以累积大量失衡值。施放一些技能时，三位一体不会移动，也许是用普通攻击打破隐形的好时机。
tipContents.en: TRICKERY FORM: End the Triaggelos's stealth mode to apply high Stagger to it. The Triaggelos does not move when casting skills, making it the best time to end its stealth with basic attacks.

tipContents.cn: 强攻形态：如果能及时打断它的技能蓄力，可以对其累积高额失衡值。
tipContents.en: ASSAULT FORM: Interrupt the charging of the Triaggelos's skill to apply high Stagger to it.

tipContents.cn: 搜查形态：要注意靠近源石树枝，躲避大型锚点波。从地面袭来的小型锚点波可以用跳跃躲避。
tipContents.en: SEARCH FORM: Get close to the Originium branches for protection against the large Ankhor shockwaves. Smaller shockwaves can be evaded by jumping over them.

tipContents.cn: 诡计形态：打破其隐形的话，可以累积大量失衡值。施放一些技能时，三位一体不会移动，也许是用普通攻击打破隐形的好时机。
tipContents.en: TRICKERY FORM: End the Triaggelos's stealth mode to apply high Stagger to it. The Triaggelos does not move when casting skills, making it the best time to end its stealth with basic attacks.

tipContents.cn: 注意躲避地面上由碾骨焰术师引导的雾火。
tipContents.en: Avoid the hazefyre channeled by the Bonekrusher Pyromancers.

tipContents.cn: 注意躲避地面上由碾骨焰术师引导的雾火。
tipContents.en: Avoid the hazefyre channeled by the Bonekrusher Pyromancers.

tipContents.cn: 注意躲避地面上由碾骨焰术师引导的雾火。
tipContents.en: Avoid the hazefyre channeled by the Bonekrusher Pyromancers.

tipContents.cn: 注意躲避地面上由碾骨焰术师引导的雾火。
tipContents.en: Avoid the hazefyre channeled by the Bonekrusher Pyromancers.

tipContents.cn: 注意躲避地面上由碾骨焰术师引导的雾火。
tipContents.en: Avoid the hazefyre channeled by the Bonekrusher Pyromancers.

tipContents.cn: 碾骨清道夫在使用喷火器时转身较慢，绕到背后会更容易躲开攻击。
tipContents.en: Bonekrusher Arsonists turn slower when spewing jets of fire with their flamethrowers. Get behind them to dodge the jets of fire easily.

tipContents.cn: 碾骨清道夫在使用喷火器时转身较慢，绕到背后会更容易躲开攻击。
tipContents.en: Bonekrusher Arsonists turn slower when spewing jets of fire with their flamethrowers. Get behind them to dodge the jets of fire easily.

tipContents.cn: 碾骨清道夫在使用喷火器时转身较慢，绕到背后会更容易躲开攻击。
tipContents.en: Bonekrusher Arsonists turn slower when spewing jets of fire with their flamethrowers. Get behind them to dodge the jets of fire easily.

tipContents.cn: 他的箭雨会造成持续伤害并在延迟数秒后产生爆炸，注意躲避。
tipContents.en: The enemy fires a barrage of arrows that deal DMG over time and explode after a delay of several seconds. Try to dodge them.

tipContents.cn: 他的箭雨落在地面上延迟数秒后会产生爆炸。
tipContents.en: Upon hitting the ground, the enemy's barrage of arrows will explode after a short delay.

tipContents.cn: 他的箭雨落在地面上延迟数秒后会产生爆炸。
tipContents.en: Upon hitting the ground, the enemy's barrage of arrows will explode after a short delay.

tipContents.cn: 他的箭雨落在地面上延迟数秒后会产生爆炸。
tipContents.en: Upon hitting the ground, the enemy's barrage of arrows will explode after a short delay.

tipContents.cn: 他的箭雨落在地面上延迟数秒后会产生爆炸。
tipContents.en: Upon hitting the ground, the enemy's barrage of arrows will explode after a short delay.

tipContents.cn: 他的箭雨落在地面上延迟数秒后会产生爆炸。
tipContents.en: Upon hitting the ground, the enemy's barrage of arrows will explode after a short delay.

tipContents.cn: 他的箭雨落在地面上延迟数秒后会产生爆炸。
tipContents.en: Upon hitting the ground, the enemy's barrage of arrows will explode after a short delay.

tipContents.cn: 请注意，她处于攻击动作时就无法进行闪避了。
tipContents.en: If she's in the middle of her attack move, she won't be able to dodge. Keep this in mind.

tipContents.cn: 请注意，她处于攻击动作时就无法进行闪避了。
tipContents.en: If she's in the middle of her attack move, she won't be able to dodge. Keep this in mind.

tipContents.cn: 请注意，她处于攻击动作时就无法进行闪避了。
tipContents.en: If she's in the middle of her attack move, she won't be able to dodge. Keep this in mind.

tipContents.cn: 这个敌人很强大，穿戴装备和战术物品能够大幅度提高干员的生存能力。
tipContents.en: This enemy is extremely powerful. Equip quality gear and tacticals to vastly improve your operators' survivability.

tipContents.cn: 这个敌人很强大，穿戴装备和战术物品能够大幅度提高干员的生存能力。
tipContents.en: This enemy is extremely powerful. Equip quality gear and tacticals to vastly improve your operators' survivability.

tipContents.cn: 白垩界卫可以从宇宙中召唤无数锚点，只有躲避这些攻击，才能找到反击的机会。
tipContents.en: The Marble Aggelomoirai can summon countless Ankhors from the Universe. Dodge these attacks to find a way to retaliate.

tipContents.cn: 白垩界卫会根据敌人的位置采用不同形态的进攻，找到规律或许是破局的办法
tipContents.en: The Marble Aggelomoirai will change its form and attack according to its opponent's position. Figuring out its pattern will be key to victory.

tipContents.cn: 肖像天使跃起或后撤后，会发动多种强力攻击，要小心。
tipContents.en: Careful. The Effigy unleashes various powerful attacks when it jumps or retreats.

tipContents.cn: 肖像天使跃起或后撤后，会发动多种强力攻击，要小心。
tipContents.en: Careful. The Effigy unleashes various powerful attacks when it jumps or retreats.

tipContents.cn: 尝试避开肖像天使的滚动轨迹！
tipContents.en: Try to avoid the Effigy's rolling attack!

tipContents.cn: 一旦被侵蚀爪牙扑到，就很难脱离它的连续进攻。
tipContents.en: Once a Blighted Klaw makes a successful pounce, its prey will find it hard to jerk free from its consecutive attacks.

tipContents.cn: 一旦被侵蚀爪牙扑到，就很难脱离它的连续进攻。
tipContents.en: Once a Blighted Klaw makes a successful pounce, its prey will find it hard to jerk free from its consecutive attacks.

tipContents.cn: 白垩附肢擅长攻击近距离的敌人，可以使用战技打断它们的蓄力技能。
tipContents.en: Marble Appendages are skilled at attacking melee opponents. Use battle skills to interrupt them when they are charging up their attacks.

tipContents.cn: 白垩附肢擅长攻击远距离的敌人，注意躲避它们末端化为的侵蚀。
tipContents.en: Marble Appendages are skilled at attacking ranged opponents by converting their tips into Blight projectiles and firing them. Take care to dodge.

tipContents.cn: 若有干员被他抓住，可尽快用其他干员使用技能打断来解救。
tipContents.en: If an operator is grabbed, use another operator's skill to interrupt the enemy and free the grabbed operator.

tipContents.cn: 若有干员被他抓住，可尽快用其他干员使用技能打断来解救。
tipContents.en: If an operator is grabbed, use another operator's skill to interrupt the enemy and free the grabbed operator.

tipContents.cn: 若有干员被他抓住，可尽快用其他干员使用技能打断来解救。
tipContents.en: If an operator is grabbed, use another operator's skill to interrupt the enemy and free the grabbed operator.

tipContents.cn: 不要在同一个位置停留，保持移动，否则可能会被脚下突然钻出的源石柱攻击到。
tipContents.en: Keep moving. If you stay at one place too long, Originium pillars will erupt from the ground and strike you.

tipContents.cn: 不要在同一个位置停留，保持移动，否则可能会被脚下突然钻出的源石柱攻击到。
tipContents.en: Keep moving. If you stay at one place too long, Originium pillars will erupt from the ground and strike you.

tipContents.cn: 使他失衡一次即可击碎他的盾牌。
tipContents.en: Stagger this enemy once to break his shield.

tipContents.cn: 使他失衡一次即可击碎他的盾牌。
tipContents.en: Stagger this enemy once to break his shield.

tipContents.cn: 尽可能踩掉全部装甲碎片，以免碾骨破城者回收碎片重振旗鼓。但记得迅速离开碎片的爆炸范围。
tipContents.en: Stomp and crush all armor shards to prevent the Bonekrusher Siegeknuckles from recovering his strength. Also, try to avoid the explosive radius of the shards.

tipContents.cn: 小心应对碾骨破城者的连续攻击。即使截断他的攻势，他也仍有可能继续发动进攻。
tipContents.en: Be careful when facing the barrage of attacks from the Bonekrusher Siegeknuckles. Even after being interrupted, he is likely to keep attacking again.

tipContents.cn: 注意躲避飞行天使释放的小旋风。
tipContents.en: Take care to avoid the little whirlwinds launched by Falsewings.

tipContents.cn: 注意躲避飞行天使释放的小旋风。
tipContents.en: Take care to avoid the little whirlwinds launched by Falsewings.

tipContents.cn: 在架盾形态下，尽快击破跂步晶城背后暴露的弱点。
tipContents.en: When the Walking Chrysopolis activates its shields, try to get around it and attack the weakpoint exposed on its rearside.

tipContents.cn: 在架盾形态下，尽快击破跂步晶城背后暴露的弱点。
tipContents.en: When the Walking Chrysopolis activates its shields, try to get around it and attack the weakpoint exposed on its rearside.

tipContents.cn: 棱镜天使会大幅强化周围的同伴，尝试优先消灭它。
tipContents.en: The Prism can greatly strengthen nearby allies to improve their capabilities. Take it down first.

tipContents.cn: 棱镜天使会大幅强化周围的同伴，尝试优先消灭它。
tipContents.en: The Prism can greatly strengthen nearby allies to improve their capabilities. Take it down first.

tipContents.cn: 破潮之像在远程状态下会施放强力攻击，追上它，打断它的技能
tipContents.en: The Tidalklast has a ranged form with powerful attacks. Chase it down and interrupt its skills.

tipContents.cn: 潮行天使会使用带寒冷附着的攻击，小心不要被冻结。
tipContents.en: Tidewalkers have attacks that apply Cryo Infliction. Be careful and try not to get Solidified by them.
